<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4958</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Advice on Working in a Team</string>
            <string language="es">Consejos para trabajar en equipo</string>
            <string language="ga">Comhairle maidir le Oibriú ar Fhoireann</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rat auf dem Arbeiten in einem Team</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conseil sur travailler dans une équipe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conselho em trabalhar em uma equipe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Consiglio sul funzionamento in una squadra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμβουλές για την εργασία σε μια ομάδα</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This will help you to get organised when you are doing a group task or assignment.</string>
            <string language="es">Este recurso ayudará a organizarse cuando se esté haciendo una tarea o un trabajo en grupo</string>
            <string language="ga">Cabhróidh sé leat bheith eagraithe nuair atá tú i mbun tasc grúpa.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">LCA</string>
            <string language="es">LCA. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">ATF</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses hilft Ihnen, zu erhalten organisiert, wann 
Sie eine Gruppe Aufgabe oder eine Anweisung tun.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ceci vous aidera à obtenir organisé quand vous 
faites un groupe chargez ou affectation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto ajudar-lhe-á começar organizado quando você
está fazendo uma tarefa ou uma atribuição do grupo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò li aiuterà ad ottenere organizzati quando 
state facendo un'operazione o un'assegnazione del gruppo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό θα σας βοηθήσει για να πάρει οργανωμένους πότε 
κάνετε μια στοιχειώδη εργασία ή μια ανάθεση ομάδας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.
